title: The Refiners fire
creator_credit: C Hemenway, R. Grossman, K Beasley, Doubleday Multi Media and Entropy
brief_description: A film produced by high school students, employing animated squares and circles depicting a situation in which a person with new ideas, may influence some, but is often persecuted by the majority. Provides a discussion point on leadership, resistance to change and group dynamics.
